scenes.visual_description: Close-up on a large, shiny red button in a vibrant, minimalist room. Digital comic book art style, with bold outlines and dynamic lighting.  The button glows faintly.
A finger, dramatically lit from above, reaches out and presses the button.  Sparks fly in a stylized, comic book burst.  Same art style.
Wide shot revealing the room transformed into a tropical paradise. Palm trees sway, a hammock swings gently.  Bright, saturated colors, maintaining the digital comic book aesthetic.
